snippet: The investment company owned by the billionaire Philip Anschutz has decided to call off efforts to sell the Anschutz Entertainment Group, a sports and live entertainment juggernaut.
abstract: The investment company owned by the billionaire Philip Anschutz has decided to call off efforts to sell the Anschutz Entertainment Group, a sports and live entertainment juggernaut.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Anschutz Calls Off Sale of Entertainment Arm
